title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 6 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 6 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: My son, if thou be surety for thy friend, if thou hast stricken thy hand with a stranger,
lineList.cn: 我儿，你若为朋友作保，替外人击掌，

lineList.en: Thou art snared with the words of thy mouth, thou art taken with the words of thy mouth.
lineList.cn: 你就被口中的话语缠住，被嘴里的言语捉住。

lineList.en: Do this now, my son, and deliver thyself, when thou art come into the hand of thy friend; go, humble thyself, and make sure thy friend.
lineList.cn: 我儿，你既落在朋友手中，就当这样行，才可救自己。你要自卑，去恳求你的朋友。

lineList.en: Give not sleep to thine eyes, nor slumber to thine eyelids.
lineList.cn: 不要容你的眼睛睡觉，不要容你的眼皮打盹。

lineList.en: Deliver thyself as a roe from the hand of the hunter, and as a bird from the hand of the fowler.
lineList.cn: 要救自己，如鹿脱离猎户的手，如鸟脱离捕鸟人的手。

lineList.en: Go to the ant, thou sluggard; consider her ways, and be wise:
lineList.cn: 懒惰人哪，你去察看蚂蚁的动作，就可得智慧。

lineList.en: Which having no guide, overseer, or ruler,
lineList.cn: 蚂蚁没有元帅，没有官长，没有君王，

lineList.en: Provideth her meat in the summer, and gathereth her food in the harvest.
lineList.cn: 尚且在夏天豫备食物，在收割时聚敛粮食。

lineList.en: How long wilt thou sleep, O sluggard? when wilt thou arise out of thy sleep?
lineList.cn: 懒惰人哪，你要睡到几时呢。你何时睡醒呢。

lineList.en: Yet a little sleep, a little slumber, a little folding of the hands to sleep:
lineList.cn: 再睡片时，打盹片时，抱着手躺卧片时，

lineList.en: So shall thy poverty come as one that travelleth, and thy want as an armed man.
lineList.cn: 你的贪穷就必如强盗速来，你的缺乏仿佛拿兵器的人来到。

lineList.en: A naughty person, a wicked man, walketh with a froward mouth.
lineList.cn: 无赖的恶徒，行动就用乖僻的口。

lineList.en: He winketh with his eyes, he speaketh with his feet, he teacheth with his fingers;
lineList.cn: 用眼传神，用脚示意，用指点划。

lineList.en: Frowardness is in his heart, he deviseth mischief continually; he soweth discord.
lineList.cn: 心中乖僻，常设恶谋，布散分争。

lineList.en: Therefore shall his calamity come suddenly; suddenly shall he be broken without remedy.
lineList.cn: 所以灾难必忽然临到他身。他必顷刻败坏无法可治。

lineList.en: These six things doth the LORD hate: yea, seven are an abomination unto him:
lineList.cn: 耶和华所恨恶的有六样，连他心所憎恶的共有七样。

lineList.en: A proud look, a lying tongue, and hands that shed innocent blood,
lineList.cn: 就是高傲的眼，撒谎的舌，流无辜人血的手，

lineList.en: An heart that deviseth wicked imaginations, feet that be swift in running to mischief,
lineList.cn: 图谋恶计的心，飞跑行恶的脚，

lineList.en: A false witness that speaketh lies, and he that soweth discord among brethren.
lineList.cn: 吐谎言的假见证，并弟兄中布散分争的人。

lineList.en: My son, keep thy father's commandment, and forsake not the law of thy mother:
lineList.cn: 我儿，要谨守你父亲的诫命，不可离弃你母亲的法则。（或作指教）

lineList.en: Bind them continually upon thine heart, and tie them about thy neck.
lineList.cn: 要常系在你心上，挂在你项上。

lineList.en: When thou goest, it shall lead thee; when thou sleepest, it shall keep thee; and when thou awakest, it shall talk with thee.
lineList.cn: 你行走，他必引导你。你躺卧，他必保守你。你睡醒，他必与你谈论。

lineList.en: For the commandment is a lamp; and the law is light; and reproofs of instruction are the way of life:
lineList.cn: 因为诫命是灯，法则（或作指教）是光。训诲的责备是生命的道。

lineList.en: To keep thee from the evil woman, from the flattery of the tongue of a strange woman.
lineList.cn: 能保你远离恶妇，远离外女谄媚的舌头。

lineList.en: Lust not after her beauty in thine heart; neither let her take thee with her eyelids.
lineList.cn: 你心中不要恋慕他的美色，也不要被他的眼皮勾引。

lineList.en: For by means of a whorish woman a man is brought to a piece of bread: and the adulteress will hunt for the precious life.
lineList.cn: 因为妓女能使人只剩一块饼，淫妇猎取人宝贵的生命。

lineList.en: Can a man take fire in his bosom, and his clothes not be burned?
lineList.cn: 人若怀里搋火，衣服岂能不烧呢。

lineList.en: Can one go upon hot coals, and his feet not be burned?
lineList.cn: 人若在火炭上走，脚岂能不烫呢。

lineList.en: So he that goeth in to his neighbour's wife; whosoever toucheth her shall not be innocent.
lineList.cn: 亲近邻舍之妻的，也是如此。凡挨近他的，不免受罚。

lineList.en: Men do not despise a thief, if he steal to satisfy his soul when he is hungry;
lineList.cn: 贼因饥饿偷窃充饥，人不藐视他。

lineList.en: But if he be found, he shall restore sevenfold; he shall give all the substance of his house.
lineList.cn: 若被找着，他必赔还七倍。必将家中所有的，尽都偿还。

lineList.en: But whoso committeth adultery with a woman lacketh understanding: he that doeth it destroyeth his own soul.
lineList.cn: 与妇人行淫的，便是无知，行这事的，必丧掉生命。

lineList.en: A wound and dishonour shall he get; and his reproach shall not be wiped away.
lineList.cn: 他必受伤损，必被凌辱。他的羞耻不得涂抹。

lineList.en: For jealousy is the rage of a man: therefore he will not spare in the day of vengeance.
lineList.cn: 因为人的嫉恨，成了烈怒。报仇的时候，决不留情。

lineList.en: He will not regard any ransom; neither will he rest content, though thou givest many gifts.
lineList.cn: 什吗赎价，他都不顾。你虽送许多礼物，他也不肯干休。
